subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Andy Schleck took over the Tour de France’s overall lead on Tuesday from Cadel Evans, who disclosed a broken elbow. Alberto Contador was second, 41 seconds back.
snippet: Andy Schleck took over the Tour de France’s overall lead on Tuesday from Cadel Evans, who disclosed a broken elbow. Alberto Contador was second, 41 seconds back.
